description: Square array a(n,k) read by antidiagonals: a(n,1)=n, a(1,k)=k, a(n,k)=a(n-1,k-1)*a(n-1,k)*a(n,k-1).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..70
maple: A047675 := proc(n,k) option remember; if n = 1 then k; elif k = 1 then n; else A047675(n-1,k-1)*A047675(n,k-1)*A047675(n-1,k); fi; end;
mathematica: a[n_, 1] := n; a[1, k_] := k; a[n_, k_] := a[n, k] = a[n-1, k-1]*a[n-1, k]*a[n, k-1]; Table[a[n-k+1, k], {n, 1, 8}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 08 2013 *)
crossrefs: Main diagonal is A047676. Rows give A047677, A047678.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
